name: optics-ts
description: Type-safe, ergonomic, polymorphic optics for TypeScript
author: Petri Lehtinen <petri@digip.org>

scripts.build: ./scripts/generate-index.ts > src/index.ts && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && prettier --write {src,tests}
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.doctoc: doctoc README.md --title '## Table of Contents' && prettier --write README.md
